text: [Music]
the magic pot this story is of a farmer
and his magic pot in a faraway village
lived a farmer named Rama Rama was a
good and wise man he owned a few acres
of land though he was a good farmer his
land never produced any grapes while
other farmers harvested and stoned Rama
used to plow plow and plow but his farm
was always bearing
[Music]
why do you plow every day this land is
not giving you a single crop since years
now you should sell this land and buy a
good land somewhere else oh brother this
land belongs to my ancestors they used
to farm on this very soil I must be
doing something wrong I will keep trying
I wish you all the best brother Rama did
not want to give away his land at any
cost he spent days without food he ate
fruits to survive every day he went and
ploughed I will plough until I find out
why my land does not yield crops I so
every year where do my seeds go Rama
cloud and ploughed I am so tired
Rama ploughed the entire field it was
late afternoon when he finally thought
of resting Rama was now too hungry to
carry on the flowey he was about to stop
ploughing when his Spade hit something
deep into the ground
what is this sounds like some kind of
metal oh what a huge pot that's strange
who would bury a metal pot so deep in a
field this is useless Rama was angry for
having wasted his energy over nothing he
threw his Spade into the metal pot and
sat in the shade of the tree I think I
must now sell this land I cannot always
stay hungry this land will never give me
anything
Rama rested under the shade eating the
fruits he had bought for himself they
were far less compared to the hunger
Rama felt he sat there for over an hour
thinking about his land and feeling
sorry he knew he had to give the land
away he had no choice I have to be
strong now this ancestral land has to be
given away I must go home before it gets
dark as Rama walked back to the pot to
take his Spade he was shocked to see
what had happened
what who kept this here I was here the
whole time
Rama found that the pot now had 100
Spade just like the one he had he could
not tell which Spade belonged to him
this cannot be is this a magic pot
let me try something Rama took 100
Spades out and kept a single grape in
the pot he could not believe in mine
that single grape was now a hundred
grapes this indeed is a magic pot I
cannot believe this let me take this pot
home oh this is heavy let me find a rope
Rama tied one end of the rope book to
the pot and the other end to his waist
he then dragged the pot home and he
reached he thought about other things he
could put in the pot firstly let me put
an egg I am very hungry and have only
been eating very little fruit Rama
quickly went to the market and spent all
his savings to buy one single egg he
then placed that egg in the pot in no
time the pot was full of eggs Rama was
very happy he cooked two eggs for
himself I have never tasted anything
like this but what do I do with the
other 98 eggs oh I can sell these eggs
and make money Rama then realized that
the pot can not only give him food to
eat but can also help him earn after
selling all the eggs Rama used the pot
for different things when he needed
cloth he would place a small piece of
cloth pot would give cloth to make
dresses for at least 15 people if he
needed shirts he would place a stitched
shirt in the pot and the pot would give
up 100 shirts
in this way drama started putting grains
fruits cloth and even spices inside the
pot the pot kept giving many things
the villagers wondered about the farmers
success however nobody could discover
the truth Brahma always hid his pot well
in the corner of his house under a cloth
one day Rama thought of testing his pot
he placed a pen inside and waited to see
what happens suddenly there were 100
hens jumping out of the pot slapping
their wings there were hens everywhere
oh why didn't I put a dead fish instead
who will I catch so many hands one-fluid
sat on his head come here all of you
we're scared no wait one of the hens
flew and sat inside the pot again and
again there were 100 hens jumping out my
house has become a chicken coop what do
I do
ramaa them quickly covered the pot and
kept it in a corner of his house he then
ran out of his house all the hens
followed him the villagers were
surprised to see so many hens run out of
Robert's house so many hands I must use
this pot very wisely but Rama had not
realized that a king soldier was
listening to him he heard about the pot
and ran to the king to explain the
entire story so many chickens from a
single pot how is this possible
this must be a magic pot bring Rama and
the pot here immediately
that pot belongs in the Treasury Rama
knew why the king had asked him to get
the pot a king is a greedy man maybe he
wants all the wealth only for himself
bring me the pot this is a big pot
but how can this pot produce so many
hens let me see what is inside the pot
Oh No
don't do that but it was too late
as the King leaned in for slips and fell
inside the pot now there are 100 kings
climbing out of the pot or before
anybody can say anything see all started
fighting with each other high throw
don't go up there no it's mine I am the
key no this is my kingdom the hall was
full of kings save our King yes but
which one is ours their true king and
within minutes that killed each other
the palace grieved for now the Kingdom
had no one to rule Brahma soon realized
how dangerous the pot is he ran towards
the pot and Bank drafted under her he
was sad to have lost his magic pot but
Rama now had a land which grew crops
he started farming
satisfied lights
[Music]
